description.value:
This +1 leather lamellar armor incorporates the plates of an ore louse's hide, woven together with the creature's own sinew into a functional set of armor. While wearing the rusting carapace, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against any effect that would rust you or your items, such as the ore louse's Strikes that have the rust ability or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Rust Cloud] spell.

Activate 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect Oxidizing liquid seeps from between the segments of the rusting hide onto a nearby metal creature, non-magical metal hazard, or non-magical metal item of up to 1 Bulk. A targeted creature or hazard gets a @Check[fortitude|dc:24|basic] save; a targeted item automatically gets a critical failure if unattended, but a creature holding or wearing it can attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:24|basic] save. The rust deals @Damage[8d6[untyped]] damage to a creature or hazard, plus @Damage[2d6[persistent, untyped]]{2d6 persistent} damage on a failed save; it deals @Damage[2d6[untyped]] damage to an item, plus @Damage[1d6[persistent, untyped]]{1d6 persistent} damage on a failed save.

Craft Requirements The initial raw materials must include the hide of an ore louse.
